title: Lust For A Vampire
description: The Ruins of Karnstein Castle rose gaunt and menacing over the small hamlet of Styria. Legend had it that every forty years the long dead Karnsteins rose from their graves to find fresh blood and new recruits for the ranks of the Undead. But legend is all too often dismissed as superstition...and now the grounds of Karnstein housed a select finishing school for young ladies. (back cover copy)
author: William Hughes
